name: Dave in Danger
description:
Relive the good old days with Dave in Danger, a fun arcade game inspired by classics of the 90s.

Control the character using the keyboard of your Mac and walk through an adventure of 10 levels. In each level you have to collect the key to unlock the door and pass to the next one.

Use a jetpack to fly and a gun to defeat the enemies.

A simple and fun retro game.
